results.title: RAISE Family Caregivers Act
results.latest_major_action: Special Committee on Aging. Hearings held.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) Recognize, Assist, Include, Support, and Engage Family Caregivers Act of 2017 or the RAISE Family Caregivers Act (Sec. 3) This bill directs the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to develop, maintain, and periodically update a National Family Caregiving Strategy. (Sec. 4) HHS shall convene a Family Caregiving Advisory Council to advise it on recognizing and supporting family caregivers.
